level.text: Each Demonstration Project recipient that is aggrieved by a decision of the District affecting that recipient’s eligibility to receive a covered service through the Demonstration Project shall be entitled to file a written grievance with the Department of Health, Senior Deputy Director for the Medical Assistance Administration. All other recipients aggrieved by a decision shall be entitled to a hearing before the District of Columbia Office of Administrative Appeals as provided in D.C. Official Code ยง4-210.01 and 42 CFR Part 431.200.
